title: Cannot store past history and frequently used sites.
content: I have lost the abilty to save any history and store commonly used sites. For instance, I have to login into Outlook every time I switch on my laptop.
creator: david.allen.13

title: Emails
content: On Friday 3rd June there was an update on Firefox Since that time I have not been able to open any attachments on my Windows Live Mail. I have never ever had this problem before It has been established that the problem is with Firefox I need this problem to be fixed as soon as possible please I have tried many ways but no luck at all. Please answer in easy to understand answers, as when I have looked on Google they are very complicated Thankyou With Regards Carol
creator: angelflower2105

title: Can't retrieve my original Firefox account
content: My hard drive became corrupted. I got a new hard drive. I entered my email for my Firefox account and then my password. I was sent a verification code. I entered the code. Fiefox said the password was incorrect but sent me another verification code and again told me my password was incorrect. This process would repeat over and over again. I can't get into my account. I need my bookmarks and passwords. What is going on. Firefox even saved the account email and password when I entered it. I will quit using this browser if I can't get my account back. I don't trust Firefox anymore. Thanks
creator: david-bozzi

title: How to disable the Shift F to open developer tools?
content:
Currently using 101.0 (64 bit) on Windows 10.

It's quite annoying to try to type a capital F using Shift F but end up with developer mode.

I tried in privacy mode and this still occcurs, so I think it's not something my add-ons do.

Is there any way to disable this feature?
creator: Plow1073

title: Extension data is gone (being reset) after some time
content: I wasn't using Firefox for a month and now when I open it all my extensions seem to be reset. All the data are gone, Note is empty, OneTab is empty, Bitwarden is logged out. The Firefox account and websites are still logged in. I didn't click anything like refresh data. What could be the issue and is my data still recoverable?
creator: skygate

title: Bookmarks
content:
Hi

I would like to know if there is a way to find the address in the bookmarks and its corresponding folder?
